âš¡ Install in 60 Seconds

OpenClaw makes skill installation dead simple. Choose your preferred method:

Method 1: Via Telegram Bot (Recommended)

Chat with your OpenClaw bot on Telegram:

You: Install the ux-master skill from GitHub

ğŸ¾ OpenClaw: Cloning ux-master... âœ… Skill installed successfully! 1032+ design rules loaded. Type "help ux-master" to see available commands.

Method 2: One-Command Install

SSH into your VPS and run:

bash <(curl -sL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/relukdev/ux-master/main/dist/clawhub/ux-master/scripts/install.sh)

Method 3: Manual Install

# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/relukdev/ux-master.git ~/.opencode/skills/ux-master

# Or update existing installation
cd ~/.opencode/skills/ux-master && git pull

After installation, verify by asking your bot:

You: What design skills do you have?
